text: (napiye!) Ullankalil (nayavancaka) noy ullavarkal avarkalitam (tolamai kollave) viraintu celvatai nir kanpir! Melum, ‘‘(nankal avarkalai pakaittuk kontal) enkalukku or apattu erpattuvitumenru nankal payappatukirom'' enru avarkal kurukinranar. Allah tannitamiruntu verriyaiyo allatu oru (nar)kariyattaiyo (aticikkirattil unkalukku) alikkak kutum. Atu camayam avarkal tankal ullankalukkul maraittu vaittirunta (mocamana ennat)taip parri kavalai ataivarkal
